text: N-Succinimidyl 4-fluorobenzoate (SFB) is an organofluorine compound. When incorporating a fluorine-18 atom, SFB is used to label proteins or peptides for positron emission tomography. ==References== Category:Fluoroarenes Category:Benzoate esters Category:Imides
title: N-Succinimidyl 4-fluorobenzoate
